item.title: HYDRO-MECHANICAL FUEL SCAVENGE SYSTEMS – FLOAT VALVE INOPERATIVE OPEN

remarks.para: One main fuel tank float valve may be inoperative open provided associated system is deactivated.

placard.para: Placard below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel: "SCAVENGE PUMPS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Defuel the center tank using the pressure defueling procedure and drain the remaining center tank fuel (approximately 125 gallons) through the sump drain (AMM 28-26-00/201).
Deactivate left or right system by removing the appropriate fuel strainer per DMP 28-15-2-0-2.
